name: Basileus Roanas

skills.name: Triple Puncture
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Ignores [Shield] and [Block Damage] buffs, as well as 50% of the target's DEF.
Damage based on: [ATK]

Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.name: Majesty
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Decreases each target's Turn Meter by 50% if the [Stun] debuff is not placed
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Bolts of Scorn
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of stealing 1 random buff from the target. Has an 80% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 1 turn if the target has no active buffs.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff chance +10%

faction.name: High Elves
faction.default_description: High Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 28 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: High Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 25 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: High Elves originate from Aravia where they have built a wondrous, shimmering city. Living in these lands of plenty has enabled them to evolve their society to the highest degree of physical, intellectual, and spiritual achievement. High-principled, they welcome exiles and offer them new homes further east.

seo.description: Basileus Roanas is a legendary attack champion from the faction High Elves doing force damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
